alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Hardin; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 2:23PM EST until February 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of around an inch, with ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Mercer, Auglaize and Hardin Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday afternoon and Friday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain will develop this afternoon and continue into the overnight hours. A change to snow is expected overnight, before precipitation ends early Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iln as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
